posts.post_content:
Posted By: Will
First time selling here. Long time lurker, with maybe 5 posts in the last 3 years. Sold 1 item to a member before it hit the b/s/t and bought 1 item.
Perfect e-bay, but mostly buying the last couple years. So, I'll start small and, with my collection, stay small.

206's - SOLD

213-1 - best offer within the next few days - can't find much current activity to even price it. Are they rare or nobody cares or collects?

Cash, check, m.o. Simple mail.

Thanks - Will
